title: [feature request] scatter_mul_, scaller_div_, etc.
body_html:
I would like to ask, if there is a need for additional scatter_XXX functions.
Currently I'm implementing scatter_mul_, scatter_div_ and scatter_sub_.

I didn't come up with a valid use case yet, but if you think these functions would be beneficial for PyTorch I can create a merge request after finalizing the code.
body_text:
I would like to ask, if there is a need for additional scatter_XXX functions.
Currently I'm implementing scatter_mul_, scatter_div_ and scatter_sub_.
I didn't come up with a valid use case yet, but if you think these functions would be beneficial for PyTorch I can create a merge request after finalizing the code.
body:
I would like to ask, if there is a need for additional `scatter_XXX` functions.
Currently I'm implementing `scatter_mul_`, `scatter_div_` and `scatter_sub_`.

I didn't come up with a valid use case yet, but if you think these functions would be beneficial for PyTorch I can create a merge request after finalizing the code.
